title: Keycloak 15.1.1 released
content: To download the release go to .   HIGHLIGHTS   UPGRADE TO WILDFLY 26.0.0  Keycloak server was upgraded to use Wildfly 26.0.0.Final as the underlying container.  For more information on WildFly 26 refer to the .   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES  The full list of resolved issues are available in   UPGRADING  Before you upgrade remember to backup your database and check the for anything that may have changed.
